description.en:
At Astra, we have one single goal in mind : HOLISTIC GROWTH
Growing together as a community. 
Astra Holders are awarded with more Astra Tokens over time while Traders and Sellers are discouraged with the Astra Transaction Fees.
The Astra Dynamic Transaction Fees is a mere 10% but, it goes a long way. The Astra Transaction Fees allows future development of the project, funds the marketing, the support team and also supports a number of NON PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS around the world by allocating funds for huge Charitable Donations.
Astra holders can volunteer to be a part of the Astra Team to ensure full transparency with the community which is a core value of a Decentralized System.
